original_title: MMBL Money Transfer inward remittances to exceed $250 million in Financial Year 2023/24
original_body_lines: MMBL Money Transfer (Pvt) Ltd. is the largest Western Union representative in Sri Lanka, operating through a network of 3,000 sub-representatives throughout the island. The company is an equally held joint-venture between Aitken Spence and the MMBL-Pathfinder Group, During the financial year 2023/24, inward remittances through MMBL Money Transfer will exceed US$250 million, accounting for approximately 4% of worker remittances into Sri Lanka.
‘Experience the Joy of the Season at Table By Taru, Lake Lodge – Colombo’
